title: Aurora's Consort
description: Devin has his life mapped out and goals set. He wants to help others and be a good role model. What happens when he is proclaimed the Consort of the new King of Aurora, a world full of mages and murderous intent?Status: In progress/IncompleteLast update: 06/14/2010Word count: approx. 511,539
